EmailTemplate.name: QS Missed Review
EmailTemplate.subject: Subject
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We were unable to reach you to complete the review of your business formation details with you.
Starting a business can be hectic, and I know it can be difficult to find time in a busy schedule. This review is important as we cannot move forward with your business formation until we have gathered the remaining information necessary for filing.
To complete your review, please call me directly at (855) 787-1958 x{!User.Extension} Monday–Friday from 6 am – 6 pm PT or simply reply to this message. If I’m unavailable, you can also email QuickStart@legalzoom.com to reach the next available member of my team.
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom. I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.FirstName} Business Account Manager (855)-787-1958 x{!User.Extension} QuickStart@legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
